name: Node-based Software Synthesizer
description: An advanced synthesizer written in C++ using SDL_audio. You could assemble your own node graph combining waveforms to produce a variety of sounds.

name: 3D Rendering Engine
description: A non-physically-based 3D rendering engine written in C++ using OpenGL 3.3. The engine supported shadow mapping, normal mapping and post-processing effects.

name: Todo List
description: A simple Todo List app made using Angular and TailwindCSS.

name: Pizzapp
description: Pizzeria app concept built using Flutter.

name: Credit Card
description: A credit card UI concept made with Flutter.

name: GUI System and Node Editor
description: A GUI system consisting of an event system and basic widgets and a Node-based editor for image processing. Made in C++, Windows API and OpenGL.
